summary:
Heck I just showed my 12 year old cousin the detective pikachu trailer and she practically fell in love with it
Pretty different...
body:
Heck I just showed my 12 year old cousin the detective pikachu trailer and she practically fell in love with it

Pretty different from when I showed her the sonic poster where she was terrified

Good job Paramount you’re literally scaring your target audience

blog.name: sarahssideblog
blog.title: Glen Lerner Is The Way To Go
blog.description:
Sarah/ 21/ she-her / dec. 26 ♑️/ INFP/gay-aroace~ Feel free to talk to me about anything. I like to draw, but if you don't wanna see my art I do tag as simply "art". I am autistic, and just relatively an idiot, so pls be patient with me if I get confused or irritated! My main interests revolve around pokemon, legend of Zelda, Care Bears, and Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde, and really just my own ocs. Don’t be afraid to talk to me, I’m a nobody!! Instagram is lavenderhyde2222,

Deviantart is Graystripe24, Vulture culture blog is jekyll-and-formaldehyde (warning for that blog for bones/dead things/ blood!), and my ffnet account is LavenderHyde!

Please don’t tag any of my art as kin!

My kofi- http://ko-fi.com/lavenderhyde

summary: The things I think about
title: The things I think about
body:
Given their design choices are technically going a similar route I am kind of wondering what tie-in merchandise could be for when Detective Pikachu and the Sonic movie come out.The original style could easily be stuck to with tags of the movie’s title slapped on them or right under our noses some genius toymakers are working on designs that more fit the films’ representations of the characters.

Pokemon merchandise generally does not have me too worried.It tends to be of a rather good quality and if they keep to the traditional style then we’d just be getting your average Pikachu in a deerstalker.If they want to have it be more to the movie’s presentation I get some slight concern…Especially if they go off and decide to make a talking toy of the titular character given the whole soft outside, hard inside and potential mouth movement factor.I see the mons in general if this route is done working better as figurines than something stuffed.I also think the best way to currently compare what a Mr.Mime figure could look like if they play a big enough role or some demand is shown would be the Sister Location figurine of Baby.

The path Sonic toys could go is where my major concerns are given toys related to the cast are quite the mixed bag already.In the series proper the blue blur is a member of the cast whose mouth is presented more to the side than the center and this is supposed to be one of the better plushies of him I’ve come across.

The style the Boom toys I seem to have seen last year is also okay.But at the same time I have seen some miniatures that could have been worked out better.

One of the best pieces of Sonic toys I have come across I would have to say is the Tails plushie I own:

Going by the poster I think the only slight hope is if they only make figurines of the hedgehog and whatever other major roles the film will include.Then again,I have the relative saying that action figure of Dwayne Johnson’s character from whatever that Rampage movie was does not have the best looks to him.

Well,only time will tell what horror stories we will possibly be in for.In the end I think a lot of us can generally agree these movies and the items spawned from them will likely be another strange and possibly cautionary tale from an already wild point.

blog.name: whatifgirl
blog.title: Guia's Art n' Stuff
blog.description: Animator & Character Designer. A friendly gal huge passion for characters & story. Likes to experiment & trying other stuff.

summary: Pokésong~♪ Or is it Wandermon? Anyways, a gift for @fallershipping who gave me permission to color in their dood of Looker....
caption:
Pokésong~♪ Or is it Wandermon? Anyways, a gift for @fallershipping who gave me permission to color in their dood of Looker. Decided to throw in Anabel & two of their partner Pokémon croagunk & alakazam. Had so much fun doing this in the style of Wandersong!

Also, someone from the Wandersong fan discord wanted me to make Detective Pikachu in this style as well.

Commissions | Ko-fi | Other Places to Find Me
